ModMetaData.name: Warhammer: Skaven
ModMetaData.author: Kompadt
ModMetaData.description:
Add the skaven. The ratkin of the under-empire comes to Rimworld. The vile and diabolical skaven will stage attacks against your colony with slave rats, clan rats, engineer and seers. Wielding weapons like slingshots, crossbows, various melee weapons up to simple machine guns and poison weapons. Trade with the more "friendly" skaven trader clans that offers access various traders.
New race: Skaven New animal: Rat Ogre New factions: Under-Empire, Clan Traders New weapons: slinshot, crossbow, ratling gun, poison hose/bottle New apparel: ragged tunics, cloth hoods/rags, padded armour, skaven helmet, gas-mask New security: poison mine, manable warp-lightning turret
Solo testing a mod is hard, so if there's anything concerning values or other parts feel free to leave feedback. Well, any feedback is appreciated.
